call_summary: ADA Policy Violation - Agent failed to offer accommodation

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Steven. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I want to dispute a charge on my statement.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I'm visually impaired, can you help me navigate the phone menu?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm sorry, we don't handle those requests here.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I need to speak to a supervisor.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me transfer you to my supervisor.
